title: Residential Programs
shortDescription: Live-in treatment facilities providing 24-hour care and comprehensive services.
description: Residential programs provide 24-hour care for individuals with autism who need intensive, round-the-clock support. These programs range from therapeutic boarding schools for teens to adult group homes and specialized treatment facilities. Residential settings offer structured environments with trained staff, integrated therapies, life skills training, and often educational or vocational programming. They serve individuals whose needs exceed what can be provided in a home setting.
whoCanBenefit: Families unable to provide necessary level of care
